name: Urban Loft Berlin
description: Well set in the centre of Berlin, URBAN LOFT Berlin provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a garden. Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a terrace and a bar. The property is allergy-free and is located 1 km from Berlin Central Station. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, certain units at URBAN LOFT Berlin also provide guests with a city view. At the accommodation every room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At URBAN LOFT Berlin you will find a restaurant serving Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. The hotel offers a children's playground. Languages spoken at the reception include German and English. Natural History Museum is 1.4 km from URBAN LOFT Berlin, while Memorial of the Berlin Wall is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 28 km from the accommodation.

name: Mondrian Suites Berlin Checkpoint Charlie
description: Located at the famous Checkpoint Charlie monument in central Berlin, this accommodation offers modern studios and apartments in varying sizes.The Jewish Museum and Friedrichstraße shopping street can both be reached within 5 minutes on foot. All units at Mondrian Suites Berlin am Checkpoint Charlie include a balcony or terrace and face the courtyard. Other facilities include a flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, a laptop safe, wooden flooring, a refrigerator, a microwave oven, a dishwasher, and a Nespresso coffee machine. Guests can also enjoy complimentary Molten Brown toiletries and a USB port. Additionally, the front desk is open 24-hours a day. The property is surrounded by international cafés and restaurants. Offering a bike rental service, the property is ideal for guests looking to explore the city. Berlin’s Brandenburg Gate is easily reachable by foot. Mondrian Suites Berlin am Checkpoint Charlie is set just a 2-minute walk from Kochstraße Underground Station.

name: Nu Wave Hotel Berlin
description: This hotel offers free Wi-Fi internet and in-room flat-screen TVs. It is in Berlin’s Friedrichshain district, 700 metres from the Warschauer Straße City Rail and Underground Station. The rooms at the Nu Wave Hotel Berlin are bright and have a private bathroom. Guests will find free internet terminals in the lobby. The Nu Wave Hotel Berlin is close to many restaurants, pubs and clubs. The Mercedes-Benz sporting arena and concert venue is a 10-minute walk from the nu hotel. Alexanderplatz is 3 stops away.

name: Hotel Himmel und Havel
description: Located in Berlin by the river Havel, Hotel Himmel und Havel offers an idyllic accommodation surrounded by nature. The hotel features a playground, a garden as well as free WiFi and parking. Guests can enjoy outdoor activities like running, cycling or swimming at the beach located in 1.5 km distance. Services like bicycle or boat hire are available on request, depending on the season. The property further offers free and secure bicycle parking. Guest rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms have a kitchenette. All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite. A fresh buffet breakfast is served daily at the property. There is also a bar and a restaurant serving Italian cuisine on site. Kurfürstendamm and Messe Berlin are 14 km away, while The Brandenburg Gate and The Reichstag are about 17 km from the property. Tegel Airport is only 11 km away.

name: Hotel Grenzfall Berlin
description: Hotel Grenzfall lies in the central Mitte district of Berlin, steps from the Berlin Wall documentation centre. It offers modern rooms and a restaurant with a bar and terrace. All rooms at the Hotel Grenzfall include satellite TV and internet access. Some rooms have a balcony. The Hotel Grenzfall has a beautiful, spacious garden with a pavilion, tea house and goldfish pond. A breakfast buffet is available each morning in the Hotel Grenzfall. The restaurant serves à la carte dishes. Hotel Grenzfall Berlin is a 5-minute walk from Bernauer Straße underground station and Nordbahnhof train station. This hotel is the first Integration Hotel in Berlin Mitte, supporting the employment of disabled and non-disabled staff.

name: Novotel München City Arnulfpark
description: The Novotel Munich City Arnulfpark hotel welcomes you to the metropolitan city of Munich. You will feel right at home in our centrally located 4-star hotel near Munich main train station and the old town. Our modern, colorful lobby will feel like your second living room. In the evening, enjoy refreshing drinks and delicacies from our wide range at The FLAVE of Munich restaurant and, if you are a little hungrier, you can also enjoy delicious international dishes. A children menu is also available.accorhotels.com

name: NH München Unterhaching
description: The NH München Unterhaching hotel is set in a quiet residential of Munich, yet it’s only a 15-minute train ride to the city’s main sites. The S-Bahn station is 300m from the hotel and from here guests can access attractions such as the Marienplatz and the famous Maximilianstrasse shopping street. Business travelers will enjoy being only a 20-minute drive from the Messe Munich exhibition center and the International Congress Center. There are 80 comfortable rooms at NH München Unterhaching. All of our standard rooms come with a separate sleeping and living area and have a couch, and a small kitchenette with tea and coffee-making facilities. Each morning, we serve a delicious fresh breakfast, which you can enjoy in our bright and airy breakfast room with floor-to-ceiling windows. There are a variety of options for every taste including local specialties such as Bavarian sausages. Our lobby bar serves your favorite drinks alongside a menu of light meals and snacks. In the summer, you can enjoy these on our terrace decorated in a Bavarian beer garden style. For snacks at any time of night or day, there is a self-service Open Bar. There is also a wellness center with a gym, sauna, and steam bath.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Laimer Hof Nymphenburg Palace Munich
description: Hotel Laimer Hof Nymphenburg Palace Munich is conveniently located in the popular Nymphenburg area. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, postal service, taxi service, ticket service are just some of the facilities on offer. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, mirror, internet access wireless, air conditioning, heating. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including garden, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. For reliable service and professional staff, Hotel Laimer Hof Nymphenburg Palace Munich caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Courtyard by Marriott Munich City East
description: Our ideal location puts you in the heart of Munich City and the heart of Haidhausen. The cobblestone alleys of this popular residential area east of the Isar sometimes look more like the Parisian Left Bank than the hub of Munichs cultural life. Choose from 227 stunning guest rooms and suites at our perfectly connected hotel combining comfort and functionality. Vacationers can explore the famous hot spots like Marienplatz, Englischer Garten within 10 minutes, the Ostbahnhof station is right outside the hotel to take you further. Do not miss an excursion to one of the Bavarian lakes like Tegernsee or Chiemsee. Looking for good food we recommend The Kitchen and Bar which offers freshly made international and regional classics as well as delicious snacks and drinks. Getting hungry late at night The Grab n Go Market is at your disposal 24 hours.Marriott

name: Olymp Munich
description: This 4-star hotel in Eching offers elegantly furnished rooms, free Wi-Fi, and a spa area. It is just a 20-minute drive from Munich city centre via the nearby A9 motorway. The spacious rooms of the Olymp Munich feature fine wooden furnishings, paintings, and Italian materials. Many rooms are contained in a newly built part of the hotel. A well-equipped fitness room, 3 saunas and a hot tub can be found at the Olymp Munich`s modern spa area. There is also a relaxation room with waterbeds. A varied breakfast buffet is available every day. Guests are welcome to relax with a drink on the sun terrace or in the bar. Parking spaces are available at the Olymp Munich.

name: Hotel Prinzregent München
description: This family run hotel in Munich's Riem district is just a 10-minute drive or 5 S-Bahn stops from the centre of Munich and a 5 minutes walk to the trade fair ICM. The hotel offers a free shuttle service to the venue. Hotel Prinzregent features exclusively furnished, air-conditioned rooms with soundproofed windows, a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and designer oak floors. Family rooms are available too. The restaurant Gasthaus DER BIERMANN offers Bavarian cuisine. You can also look forward to the cosy Stüberl and the terrace in the inner courtyard. The hotel is just 400 metres from Riem Train Station and a 15-minute drive from the Allianz Arena. The Olympia Park can be reached only in 30 minutes. Some free parking spaces are available in front of the hotel, but otherwise guests can park in the underground garage for an additional charge. The A94/A99 motorway junction is 8 km away.

name: Baurs Park
description: Located in Hamburg’s pretty district of Blankenese, this privately-run hotel offers modern-style rooms and a terrace. It lies 500 metres from the banks of the River Elbe. Each non-smoking room at Baurs Park features a TV with cable channels and a desk. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A rich breakfast buffet is available every morning at Baurs Park, while a large variety of teas is served in the hotel’s tearoom. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, a tour desk and luggage storage. The property offers free parking. The hotel is 6.7 km from O2 World Hamburg, 6.7 km from Imtech-Arena and 8.2 km from Hamburg-Altona train station. Hamburg Airport is 15 km away.

name: The Rilano Hotel Hamburg
description: A terrace overlooking the River Elbe, a private pier, and a 24-hour spa are offered by this quietly located, 4-star hotel in Hamburg. The Airbus Headquarters are 1 km away. The non-smoking Rilano Hotel Hamburg has rooms with flat-screen TV, laptop safe, and free internet. Some rooms enjoy direct river views. The Rilano’s top-floor spa provides great views of the Airbus Headquarters. Facilities include a Finnish sauna and gym. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Regional and international specialities are served in the Rilano’s River View restaurant. Guests can also relax in the Fusion Bar or on the summer terrace. Ferries run from the Rilano Hamburg’s pier to the St. Pauli Landing Bridges. The Old Town district is 20 km away.

name: Jaz in the City Stuttgart
description: The lifestyle hotel Jaz in the City Stuttgart is directly next to the Milaneo shopping centre. The Königstraße is 1.5 km away and the Stadtbibliothek Underground Station is 150 metres from Jaz in the City Stuttgart. The stylish design hotel was opened in early 2018. Guest rooms comes with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a bath and a desk. The rooms include a private bathroom with a chic rain shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. All guest rooms include a wardrobe. The modern Restaurant Rhythms Bar & Kitchen features dry aged meat and steaks. The trendy Wolfram Bar & Terrace with rooftop terrace offers cocktails, wines, exclusive whiskey and gin selection snacks with views over Stuttgart on Balinese sky beds. Work out in the gym, which is open 24 hours a day, and relax in the welness area with its 2 saunas and a steam room.

name: Aparthotel und Pension am Zwinger
description: This hotel is located in Dresden's Old Town, just a few metres from Zwinger Palace, the Semperoper opera house, the Frauenkirche church and the congress centre. It occupies a restored Wilhelminian (or "Gründerzeit") period building, allowing you to experience the charm of historic Dresden up close. Despite the central and easily accessible location, the majority of rooms are extremely quiet. The apartment-style rooms are generous and bright, and feature parquet laminated floors and free WiFi. Guests receive a free bottle of mineral water on arrival. A public garage and parking on the street are available in the vicinity of the property for a fee.

name: Akademiehotel Dresden
description: This hotel is quietly located in green countryside, 2 km from Dresden Airport. It is a direct 20-minute tram ride from Dresden’s Old Town. It offers free parking. All modern rooms at the Akademiehotel Dresden feature satellite TV and a private bathroom. Many rooms offer views of the Dresdner Heide (Dresden Heath). Dining facilities at the Akademiehotel include a buffet restaurant and the Bistro Arte à-la-carte restaurant. This serves regional and international food. Guests can also dine on the summer terrace. Wellness facilities at the Akademiehotel include a sauna, massages and a fitness area. Fitness courses are free from Mondays to Fridays. The Dresden Heath countryside is ideal for jogging, hiking or cycling. Bicycle hire is available. The Akademiehotel Dresden has a cosy sports bar with a large TV. There are 2 skittle lanes and an outdoor boules area which are free for guests.

name: Johanniter Gästehaus
description: Bright, modern rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi are offered at this 3-star superior guest house, quietly located in Münster’s southern Geist district. Münster’s Old Town is a 10-minute drive away. Each of the spacious rooms at Johanniter Gästehaus includes a work desk and a free bottle of water on arrival. Toiletries and a hairdryer are provided in the modern bathrooms. The Johanniter Gästehaus offers a rich, varied breakfast buffet. This includes pastries, cereals, freshly prepared egg dishes, and specialities from the Münsterland region. Münster Botanical Gardens and Münster Main Station are 3 km from the hotel. The A43 motorway is 1 km away and free parking is provided.

name: Hotel Jagdschloss Kranichstein
description: This historic 4-star hotel offers gourmet cuisine and exclusive accommodation in the green and tranquil Kranichstein district of Darmstadt. Rooms are spacious and stylishly furnished. Jagdschloss Kranichstein is a former hunting lodge. It is set in its own extensive grounds with a large garden and woods. Lunch and a selection of cakes are available at the restaurant. Jagdschloss Kranichstein offers free on-site parking and is a good base for exploring the Rhine-Main region. The Kranichstein is 10 minutes (by car) from Darmstadt city centre, 20 minutes from Frankfurt Airport and 30 minutes from Frankfurt city centre.

name: Kameha Grand Bonn
address: Am Bonner Bogen 1, 53227 Bonn, North Rhine-Westphalia
description: WELCOME TO YOUR LIFESTYLE HOTEL IN BONN!Diversity, Design, Architecture, Spontaneity - The Kameha Grand Bonn stands for lifestyle at all different levels and is the right place for people who share a passion for the extraordinary. In addition, we write the topic of sustainability big! For the Kameha Grand Bonn, environmental responsibility is also part of the company philosophy. Thanks to our geothermal system, the Kameha Grand as a Green Hotel can cover 70 percent of its heating and cooling needs. In the midst of the idyllic and at the same time representative Bonner Bogen, the Kameha Grand Bonn surprises with its imposing architecture and sheer infinite possibilities for development. The Rhenish relaxed vibes, amusement, and naturalness meet bold style.As for stars, the only one we need is the Michelin star, situated at the top of our hotel on the 5th floor in Yunico - Japanese Fine Dining. Our combination of playful design and casual lifestyle makes us simply grand, the Kameha Grand Bonn your favourite place.WELCOME TO YOUR FAVOURITE LOCATION!Architecture, design, furnishings: At the Kameha Grand Bonn everything you see and experience is of first-class quality, but what the heart really desires goes beyond that. It is a sense of awareness which we create for our guests. An experience of serene, intimate, delight, mixed with posh yet relaxed vibes.The Kameha Grand Bonn is your favourite place to unwind and renew your quality of life, a place to let go and be taken care of and for our team at the Kameha Grand Bonn what really matters is the smile, your smile.Our service is informal, relaxed and individual. From shopping to event tickets to the restaurant visit, our guest service team lets their guests play, shares their insider tips and makes your visit a special experience.iHotelier/iStay
